mapper.select: select n.notice_no, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_regdate, n.notice_hits, n.address, sm.email as sm_m_email, m.name as sm_m_name, m.picture as sm_m_picture, s.study_no as sm_s_study_no from notice n, study_member sm, study s, member m where sm.email = m.email and sm.study_no = n.study_no and sm.study_no = s.study_no and sm.study_member_role = '스터디리더' and sm.study_no = #{value} order by notice_no desc

select n.notice_no, n.notice_title, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(n.notice_content, dbms_LoB.GETLENGTH(n.NOTICE_CONTENT)) as notice_content, n.notice_regdate, n.notice_hits, n.address, m.email, m.name, m.picture, s.study_no, s.study_name from member m, study s, notice n where m.email = n.email and s.study_no = n.study_no and n.notice_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into NOTICE(NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_REGDATE, EMAIL, STUDY_NO) values (NOTICE_SEQ.nextval, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, sysdate, #{email}, #{studyNo})
mapper.select: select a.rnum, a.notice_no, a.notice_title, a.notice_title, a.notice_content, a.notice_regdate, a.NOTICE_HITS, a.ADDRESS, a.email as sm_email, a.name as sm_m_name, a.picture as sm_m_picture, a.study_no as sm_s_study_no from (select row_number() over(order by n.notice_no desc) as rnum, n.notice_no as notice_no, n.notice_title as notice_title, n.notice_content as notice_content, n.notice_regdate as notice_regdate, n.notice_hits as notice_hits, n.address as address, sm.email as email, m.name as name, m.picture as picture, s.study_no as study_no from notice n, study_member sm, study s, member m where sm.email = m.email and sm.study_no = n.study_no and sm.study_no = s.study_no and n.study_no = #{studyNo} and sm.study_member_role = '스터디리더') a where a.rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber}
